string.text: Inspire Resolve
Friendly fleeing units under the effect of Inspire regain their resolve and return to the fight!
Friendly units under the effect of Inspire gain a short temporary speed boost!
Friendly units under the effect of Inspire gain a small temporary health boost!
Yell To Inspire
Yell To Inspire.
Your ability is still on cooldown for {TIME} second(s)!
A primal bellow echos forth from the depths of your soul!
Your banshee howl pierces the battlefield!
You let out a deafening warcry!
You explode with a thunderous roar!
Yell To Inspire {VERSION}
Base Ability Radius
Determines the base radius of your yell ability in meters, also the value for Custom Battles.
Ability Radius Increase per Level
Determines how much extra ability radius in meters per level in Leadership.
Base Ability Cooldown
Determines the base length of the cooldown period in seconds between ability uses, also the value for Custom Battles. Used in the Cooldown Gameplay Type.
Ability Cooldown Decrease per Level
Determines how much less cooldown time in seconds per level in Leadership. Used in the Cooldown Gameplay Type.
Base Ability Kill Multiplier
Determines the base inspiration multiplier of killing someone, also the value for Custom Battles. Used in the Killing Gameplay Type. 1/100.
Ability Kill Multiplier
Determines the extra inspiration multiplier of killing someone per level. Used in the Killing Gameplay Type. 1 + 1/100.
Base Allied Morale Gain
Determines the base anount of how much morale each friendly unit gains per yell, also the value for Custom Battles.
Allied Morale Gain Increase per Level
Determines how much extra morale gain per level in Leadership.
Base Enemy Chance to Flee
The % chance an enemy will flee if affected by a yell and their morale is low enough.
Chance to Flee Increase per Level
Determines how much extra % chance to make enemies flee per level in Roguery. 1/100 of a %.
Enemy Flee Morale Threshold
Determines how low morale needs to be for an enemy unit to flee.
Min Response Delay
The minimum amount of random time in seconds before a unit responds to your yell.
Max Response Delay
The maximum amount of random time in seconds before a unit responds to your yell.
Leadership Exp per Ally
The base amount (which is multiplied by attribute and focus bonus) of Leadership exp gained per ally affected by Inspire.
Roguery Exp per Enemy
The base amount (which is multiplied by attribute and focus bonus) of Roguery exp gained per enemy affected by Inspire.
Fled Enemies Return
Determines if fleeing enemies return to battle, like a taunt of sorts.
Show Sphere Indicators
Show sphere showing the area affecting soldiers.
Show Detailed Message
Show Detailed Message Text
Displays message containing a rundown of the number of friendly and enemy units affected per ability use.
Enable Cheer Random Delay
Determines if units individually respond to yells with a small random amount of delay.
Enable Cheer Animation
Determines if the player and allies units play cheering animations.
Enable Enemy Reaction
Determines whether enemies verbally respond in fear to your yells.
Gameplay Type
The type of gameplay to use.
Cooldown Gameplay System
Killing Gameplay System
Allied unit(s) that were inspired: {INSPIRED}
Allied unit(s) that are returning to battle: {RETURNING}
Enemy unit(s) that had their courage tested: {SCARED}
Enemy unit(s) that are fleeing: {FLED}
Enemy unit(s) that are returning to battle: {RETURNING}
You are not ready to use Inspire yet!
Your Inspire ability is ready!
